channel.title: Apache Jetspeed
channel.description: An Open Source Enterprise Information Portal.

item.title: Jetspeed Documentation
item.description: Jetspeed is an Open Source implementation of an Enterprise Information Portal (or Web Based Groupware). Jetspeed attempts to consume information from multiple resources on the Internet and helps the user manage large amounts of data. This information can come from multiple content types from XML to SMTP to newer protocols such as iCalendar.

item.title: XML at Jetspeed
item.description: An xml.com article on Jetspeed which covers RSS/OCS and our PSML implementation.
